Efendi Nahi.verse 41:3: Libër, argumentet e të cilit janë të qarta, (që është) Kur’ani në gjuhën arabe, për popullin që di,
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:4: si sihariques dhe paralajmërues, por shumica e tyre janë shmangë (prej studimit të tij) e nuk duan të dëgjojnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:5: (por) thonë: “Zemrat tona janë të mbuluara (blinduara e nuk kuptojnë) atë që na thërret ti neve, veshët tanë janë të shurdhër për atë, e në mes nesh e teje ka perde, andaj puno ti (në idenë tënde), (por) me të vërtetë, dhe ne do të punojmë”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:6: Thuaj: “Unë, me të vërtetë, jam njeri si ju, mua më është shpallur që Zoti juaj është vetëm një Zot, andaj lutjuni Atij sinqerisht dhe kërkoni falje prej Tij! E, mjerë për ata që i bëjnë shok Atij,
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:7: të cilët nuk japin zeqatin dhe të cilët nuk besojnë në jetën tjetër!
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:8: Me të vërtetë, ata që besojnë dhe bëjnë vepra të mira do të kenë shpërblim të pandërprerë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:9: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Vallë, a me të vërtetë ju e mohoni Atë, i cili e ka krijuar Tokën në dy ditë (periudha kohore) – dhe madje i përshkruani Atij shok? (Ja), ky është Zoti i gjithësisë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:10: Dhe, krijoi në Tokë (sipërfaqe të saj) male të palëvizshme, e bëri që në të – të krijohen shumë begati, dhe u caktoi në te (të gjithëve) furnizimin e tyre, të gjitha këto për katër ditë (periudha kohore); ky është shpjegimi për të gjithë ata që pyesin.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:11: Pastaj, vendosi (të rregullojë) qiellin, e ai ishte në gjendje mjegullire, e i tha atij (qiellit) dhe Tokës: “Dukuni (ejani të përulur) me dashje ose me dhunë!” e ata u përgjigjë: “Erdhëm vullnetarisht!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:12: Dhe, Ai krijoi (të jenë) shtatë qiej në dy ditë (periudha kohore), dhe çdo qielli i caktoi detyrat e tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:13: Nëse shmangen (refuzojnë besimin), ti thuaju: “Ju paralajmëroj me bubullimë (dënimin e tmerrshëm)) aso dënimi çfarë e goditi Adin e Themudin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:14: kur atyre u erdhën pejgamberët – para tyre dhe pas tyre (duke thënë): “Mos adhuroni (asgjë) përveç Zotit!” e ata thanë: “Sikur të kishte dashtë Zoti ynë, Ai do të kishte dërguar engjëj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:15: Sai përket Adit, ata janë madhështuar në Tokë pa kurrfarë baze dhe thonin: “Kush është më i fortë se ne?” Vallë a nuk shohin ata se Perëndia që i ka krijuar, është më i fuqishëm se ata, - e ata i kanë mohuar argumentet Tona.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:16: Dhe, Ne u dërguam atyre në ditët e shëmtuara (fatkeqësisë) erë të ftohtë, për ta shijuar dënimin poshtërues që në këtë jetë, e dënimi në jetën tjetër është edhe më poshtërues dhe atyre nuk do t’u ndihmohet.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:17: Dhe, Themudit, Ne ia kemi treguar rrugën e drejtë, por ata e deshën (preferuan) verbërimin e jo rrugën e drejtë, andaj ata i goditi dënimi i stuhishëm, poshtërues, për atë që kanë punuar;
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:18: e, i shpëtuam ata që besuan dhe që janë ruajtë (prej të këqiave).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:19: (Kujtoju atyre) Ditën kur do të tubohen armiqët e Perëndisë te zjarri (në vendin e llogarisë), e do të tubohen duke u shtyrë me forcë (dhunë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:20: dhe kur të vijnë tek ai (zjarri), kundër tyre do të dërshmojnë, veshët e tyre, sytë e tyre, dhe lëkurat e tyre – për atë që kanë punuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:21: Ata u thonë lëkurave të tyre: “Pse dëshmuat kundër nesh?” e ato përgjigjen: “Perëndia, na ka bërë që të flasim – ashtu siç i ka dhënë aftësinë e të folurit çdo sendi.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:22: Ju nuk jeni fshehur (nga frika), që kundër jush të mos dëshmojnë veshët tuaj, dhe sytë tuaj dhe lëkura juaj, por ngase keni besuar se Perëndia nuk do t’i dijë shumë ato që i keni punuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:23: Dhe, kjo bindje e juaj, që keni pasur në Zotin tuaj, u ka shkatërruar juve, e u bëtë prej atyre që janë në humbje.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:24: E, nëse ata bëhen (edhe) të durueshëm, zjarri është vendstrehim për ta; e nëse kërkojnë kthim, nuk do t’u lejohet kthimi.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:25: Ne, u kemi pas caktuar atyre (mohuesve) shokët e këqinj, të cilët ua zbukuronin atyre – ato që janë para tyre dhe ato që janë pas tyre, e në ta u realizua fjala (e dënimit), së bashku me popujt që kanë qenë para tyre – prej xhindëve dhe njerëzve.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:26: Mohuesit kanë thënë: “Mos e dëgjoni këtë Kur’an dhe flisni me zë të lartë, për ta mund atë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:27: Do të bëjmë Ne, që ta shijojnë mohuesit dënimin e ashpër dhe do t’i dënojmë ata me më të keqen, për veprat që kanë bërë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:28: Ky zjarri është dënimi i armiqve të Perëndisë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:29: (Atëherë) mohuesit do të thonë: “O Zoti ynë, tregona ata (dy grupe) prej xhindëve dhe njerëzve, që na kanë shpënë në humbje, që t’i shtrojmë nën këmbët tona, e të bëhen ndër më të fundmit (në zjarr)!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:30: Me të vërtetë, ata që thonë: “Zoti ynë është Perëndia, e pastaj vazhdojnë në të drejtë (sipas urdhërit të Perëndisë), do t’ju zbresin atyre engjëjt (dhe do t’ju thonë): “Mos u frikësoni dhe mos u pikëlloni! Dhe gëzojuni xhennetit që ju është premtuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:31: Ne jemi të afërmit tuaj në jetën e kësaj bote dhe të së ardhmes; ju në te (xhennet) do të keni çka të dëshironi dhe çka të kërkoni,
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:32: si gosti prej Atij që falë shumë dhe që është mëshirues”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:33: E, kush flet më bukur se ai që thërret te Perëndia, bënë vepra të mira dhe thotë: “Unë, me të vërtetë, jam musliman!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:34: Nuk barazohet e mira dhe e keqja! Të keqen ktheje me të mirë e atëherë – armiku yt do të të bëhet menjëherë mik i ngushtë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:35: Këtë mund ta arrijnë vetëm ata që durojnë dhe këtë mund ta arrijnë vetëm ata që janë të pajisur (me virtyte të bukura).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:36: E, nëse djalli fillon të të mashtrojë, kërko mbështetje te Perëndia.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:37: Argumente të Tij janë edhe nata dhe dita, edhe Dielli dhe Hëna.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:38: E, nëse ata madhështohen, - po, ata që janë te Zoti yt (engjëjt), e lavdërojnë Atë natën dhe ditën, e kurrë nuk mërziten.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:39: Njëri nga argumentet e Tij është edhe ai që ti e sheh tokën të përulur – të thatë, e kur e lëshojmë në të shiun, toka lëvizë dhe gjallohet.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:40: Me të vërtetë, ata që i shtrembërojnë argumentet Tona, nuk do të jenë të fshehtë te Ne.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:41: Me të vërtetë, ata që e kanë mohur Këshillën (Kur’anin), kur u ka ardhur atyre (do të dënohen).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:42: të cilit nuk mund t’i vie gënjeshtra, nga asnjëra anë (as përpara, as përmbrapa).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:43: Nuk të thuhet ty (o Muhammed) asgjë, përpos asaj që u është thënë pejgamberëve – para teje.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:44: Sikur ta kishim shpallur Kur’anin në gjuhë të huaj, ata do të thonin: “Të ishin ajetet e shpallura të kuptueshme! Vallë, (a Kur’ani) të jetë në gjuhën joarabe, (e pejgamberi) të jetë arab!? Thuaj: “Ai, për besimtarët është udhërrëfyes dhe ilaç”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:45: Dhe, Ne, me të vërtetë, ia kemi dhënë Musait Librin, e ata janë përçarë në të – dhe sikur të mos ishte Fjala e Zotit tënd e thënë më parë, atyre do t’u gjykohej menjëherë (në këtë jetë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:46: Kush bën mirë, bën për dobi të vet, e kush punon keq, punon në dëm të vet.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:47: Vetëm Perëndia është i dijshëm kur do të ndodhë Casti (Kijameti).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:48: Humbën (prej tyre) ata që i adhuronin më parë, dhe ata (tani), e dinë se nuk ka strehim për ta.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:49: Njeriu nuk mërzitet kurrë duke kërkur të mirën (te Perëndia), e nëse e godet e keqja, ai menjëherë bie në dëshpërim dhe humbë shpresën.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:50: Nëse i japim atij (njeriut) që ta shijojë mëshirën Tonë, pas një fatkeqësie që e ka goditur atë, ai me siguri, do të thotë: “Këtë e meritoj, dhe unë nuk besoj se do të ndodhë Casti (Dita e Kijametit), e nëse kthehem te Zoti im, tek Ai më takon e mira e madhe”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:51: Kur njeriut i dhurojmë dhuntitë Tona, ai shmanget dhe largohet me një anë, (nga të adhuruarit Neve), e kur ta godet e keqja, (atëherë) ai lutet gjerë e gjat).
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:52: Thuaju (atyre) o Muhammed: “A po shihni? Nëse ai (Kur’ani) është prej Perëndisë, e ju nuk e besuat; kush është në humbje më të madhe se ai që është në kundërshtim, larg (së vërtetës)?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:53: Na, atyre, do t’u dëftojmë argumentet Tona në hapësirat tokësore e qiellore, si dhe te vet ata, deri sa t’u bëhet plotësisht e qartë, se ai (Kur’ani), është i vërtetë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 41:54: E, ata, me siguri, dyshojnë në takimin me Zotin e tyre.

null.verse 41:2: (Bu Qur'an) mərhəmətli, rəhmli (olan Allah) tərəfindən nazil edilmişdir.
null.verse 41:3: Ərəbcə Qur'an olaraq (onu) bilən bir qövm üçün əyələri müfəssəl izah edilmiş bir kitabdır.
null.verse 41:4: (Bu Qur'an) həm (mö'minlərə Cənnətlə) müjdə verəndir və həm də (kafirləri cəhənnəm əzabı ilə) qorxudan.
null.verse 41:5: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Onlar deyərlər: "Sənin bizi də'vət etdiyinə (tövhid dininə) qarşı qəlblərimiz örtülü, qulaqlarımız da kardır və bizimlə sənin aranda pərdə vardır.
null.verse 41:6: (Ya Rəsulum!) De: "Mən də ancaq sizin kimi bir insanam.
null.verse 41:7: O müşriklər ki, zəkat vermir və axirətə inanmırlar!
null.verse 41:8: İman gətirib yaxşı işlər görənləri tükənməz (minnətsiz) ruzi gözləyir!"
null.verse 41:9: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) De: "Doğrudanmı siz yeri iki gündə yaradanı inkar edir və Ona şəriklər qoşursunuz? O ki, aləmlərin Rəbbidir!
null.verse 41:10: O, yer üzündə möhkəm durmuş dağlar yaratdı, onu bərəkətli etdi və (Allahdan ruzi) istəyənlər üçün bərabər olaraq orada yer əhlinin ruzisini dörd gündə (mövsümdə) müəyyən etdi.
null.verse 41:11: Sonra Allah tüstü (düman, yerdən qalxan buxar) halında olan göyə üz tutdu (göyü yaratmaq qərarına gəldi).
null.verse 41:12: Allah onları (səmaları) yeddi (qat) göy olaraq iki gündə əmələ gətirdi.
null.verse 41:13: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Əgər (Məkkə müşrikləri sənin bu sözlərindən sonra haqdan, imandan) üz döndərsələr, de: "Mən sizi Ad və Səmud ildırımı kimi bir ildırımla (bu tayfaları məhv etmiş tükürpədici bir səslə, müdhiş bir əzabla) qorxuduram!"
null.verse 41:14: Onlara əvvəllər də, sonralar da bir-birinin ardınca: "Yalnız Allaha ibadət edin" - deyən peyğəmbərlər gəldiyi zaman onlar: "Əgər Rəbbimiz (bizim ancaq Ona iman gətirməyimizi, bütlərə sitayiş etməməyimizi) istəsəydi, (peyğəmbər olaraq) mələklər endirərdi.
null.verse 41:15: Ad qövmünə gəlincə, onlar yer üzündə nahaq yerə təkəbbür göstərib dedilər: "Bizdən daha qüvvətli kim ola bilər?!" Məgər onlar düşünmədilərmi ki, özlərini yaratmış olan Allah onlardan daha qüvvətlidir?! Onlar ayələrimizi inkar edirdilər.
null.verse 41:16: Biz onlara dünyada rüsvayçılıq əzabını daddırmaq üçün o uğursuz (nəhs) günlərdə üstlərinə vıyıltı ilə əsən (çox soyuq) bir külək (qasırğa) göndərdik.
null.verse 41:17: Səmud qövmünə gəlincə, Biz onlara haqq yolu göstərdik, amma onlar korluğu (küfrü) doğru yoldan üstün tutdular.
null.verse 41:18: İman gətirib (Allahdan) qorxanları isə xilas etdik.
null.verse 41:19: Allahın düşmənləri Cəhənnəmə toplanacaqları gün onlar (əvvəlincisindən axırıncısınadək tutulub bir yerdə) saxlanacaqlar.
null.verse 41:20: Nəhayət, onlar Cəhənnəmə gəldikdə qulaqları, gözləri və dəriləri etdikləri əməllər barəsində onların əleyhinə şəhadət verəcəkdir.
null.verse 41:21: Onlar öz dərilərinə: "Nə üçün əleyhimizə şəhadət verirsiniz?" - deyəcəklər.
null.verse 41:22: Siz qulaqlarınızın, gözlərinizin və dərilərinizin əleyhinizə şəhadət verəcəklərinizdən qorxub (günah işləməkdən) çəkinmir, etdiyiniz əməllərin çoxunu isə Allahın bilməyəcəyini zənn edirsiniz.
null.verse 41:23: Sizin öz Rəbbiniz barəsində bu zənniniz sizi məhv etdi və ziyana uğrayanlardan oldunuz!
null.verse 41:24: İndi (əzaba) dözsələr də (dözməsələr də), onların məskəni Cəhənnəmdir.
null.verse 41:25: Biz onlara (Məkkə müşriklərinə) önlərindəkini və arxalarındakını (dünyanın zövq-səfasına uyub axirətə inanmamalarını) özlərinə gözəl göstərən (şeytansifət) dostlar caladıq.
null.verse 41:26: Kafir olanlar (öz dostlarına): "Bu Qur'anı dinləməyin, o oxunduqda (eşidilməsin deyə) səs-küy (şuluqluq) salın ki, bəlkə, (bununla Muhəmmədə) qalib gələsiniz!" - dedilər.
null.verse 41:27: Biz kafir olanlara mütləq şiddətli bir əzab daddıracaq, etdikləri əməllərin ən şiddətli cəzasını verəcəyik!
null.verse 41:28: Budur Allahın düşmənlərinin cəzası - Cəhənnəm (cəhənnəm odu)! Ayələrimizi inkar etmələrinin cəzası olaraq onların əbədi məskəni oradadır!
null.verse 41:29: Kafir olanlar deyəcəklər: "Ey Rəbbimiz! Cinlərdən və insanlardan bizi azdıranları bizə göstər ki, onları ayaqlarımız altına salaq, paymal olsunlar!"
null.verse 41:30: Şübhəsiz: "Rəbbimiz Allahdır!" - deyən, sonra da (sözündə) düz olan kəslərə (ölüm ayağında) mələklər nazil olub (belə deyəcəklər): "Qorxmayın və kədərlənməyin! Sizə və'd olunan Cənnətlə sevinin!
null.verse 41:31: Biz dünyada da, axirətdə də sizin dostlarınızıq.
null.verse 41:32: Bağışlayandan, rəhm edəndən (Allahdan) ruzi (ziyafət) olaraq!"
null.verse 41:33: (Xalqı) Allaha tərəf çağıran, yaxşı iş görən və: "Mən müsəlmanlardanam!" - deyən kəsdən daha gözəl danışan kim ola bilər?!
null.verse 41:34: Yaxşılıqla pislik eyni ola bilməz! (Ey mö'min kimsə!) Sən (pisliyi) yaxşılıqla dəf et! (Qəzəbə səbirlə, cəhalətə elmlə, xəsisliyə comərdliklə, cəzaya bağışlanmaqla cavab ver!) Belə olduqda aranızda düşmənçilik olan şəxsi, sanki yaxın bir dost görərsən!
null.verse 41:35: Bu (xislət) yalnız (dünyada məşəqqətlərə) səbir edənlərə verilir və yalnız böyük qismət (savab, fəzilət) sahiblərinə əta olunur!
null.verse 41:36: Əgər sənə Şeytandan (bu xislətə mane olan) bir vəsvəsə gəlsə (fəsad toxunsa), Allaha sığın.
null.verse 41:37: Gecə və gündüz, günəş və ay Onun (vəhdaniyyətinə, qüdrət və əzəmətinə dəlalət edən) əlamətlərindəndir.
null.verse 41:38: Əgər (müşriklər Allaha səcdə etməyə) təkəbbür göstərsələr (bilsinlər ki, bunun zərəri Allaha deyil, ancaq özlərinədir).
null.verse 41:39: Onun qüdrət nişanələrindən biri də budur ki, sən yer üzünü qupquru görürsən.
null.verse 41:40: Ayələrimizi inkar edənlər (ayələrimizdən üz döndərənlər) Bizdən gizli qalmazlar.
null.verse 41:41: ?zlərinə Qur'an gəldiyi zaman onu yalan hesab edənlər (mütləq cəzalarına çatacaqlar).
null.verse 41:42: Nə öncə, nə də sonra batil ona yol tapa bilməz (Şeytan onun bir sözünü, bir hərfini belə dəyişə bilməz).
null.verse 41:43: (Ya Rəsulum!) Sənə ancaq səndən əvvəlki peyğəmbərlərə deyilənlər deyilir.
null.verse 41:44: Əgər Biz onu özgə bir dildə olan Qur'an etsəydik (Məkkə müşrikləri): "Məgər onun ayələri (bizim üçün) müfəssəl izah olunmalı deyildimi?! Bu nədir? (Qur'an) özgə dildə, (Peyğəmbər isə) ərəbmidir?!" - deyərdilər.
null.verse 41:45: Biz Musaya da kitab vermişdik və onun (Tövratın) barəsində də ixtilaf düşmüşdü.
null.verse 41:46: Yaxşı iş görənin xeyiri özünə, pislik edənin də zərəri özünə olar.
null.verse 41:47: O saatı (qiyamətin nə vaxt qopacağını) bilmək yalnız Ona aiddir.
null.verse 41:48: ?ncə (dünyada) ibadət etdikləri (bütlər) onlardan qeyb olacaq və onlar özləri üçün qaçıb can qurtarmağa bir yer olmadığını yəqin edəcəklər.
null.verse 41:49: (Kafir, nankor) insan (Allahdan özünə) yaxşılıq diləməkdən usanmaz.
null.verse 41:50: Başına gələn müsibətdən sonra dərgahımızdan ona bir mərhəmət əta etsək (dadızdırsaq), mütləq: "Bu elə mənim haqqımdır.
null.verse 41:51: (Kafir, naşükür) insana ne'mət bəxş etdiyimiz zaman (imandan) üz döndərər, (haqdan) uzaqlaşıb yan gəzər.
null.verse 41:52: (Ya Peyğəmbər! O kafirlərə) de: "Bir söyləyin görək, əgər (bu Qur'an) Allah dərgahındandırsa və sonra siz də onu inkar edibsinizsə, (sizin kimi haqdan) uzaq bir nifaq (ədavət) içində olan kəsdən (haqq yolu) daha çox azmış kim ola bilər?!
null.verse 41:53: Onun (Qur'anın) haqq olduğu onlara (müşriklərə) bəlli olsun deyə, Biz öz qüdrət nişanələrimizi onlara həm xarici aləmdə (üfüqlərdə, kainatda, göylərin və yerin ətrafında), həm də onların öz daxilində mütləq göstərəcəyik.
null.verse 41:54: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Bil ki, onlar öz Rəbbi ilə qarşılaşacaqları (qiyamət günü dirilib haqq-hesab üçün Allahın hüzurunda duracaqları) barədə şəkk-şübhə içindədirlər.

null.verse 41:2: Objava je od Milostivog, Samilosnog,
null.verse 41:3: Knjiga čiji su ajeti jasno izloženi, Kur’an na arapskom jeziku za ljude koji znaju,
null.verse 41:4: vjesnik radosnih vijesti i opomena - pa opet većina njih glavu okreće, neće ni da čuje.
null.verse 41:5: Srca naša su - govore oni - "pod pokrivačima, daleka od onoga čemu nas ti pozivaš, i mi smo gluhi za to, a između nas i tebe je pregrada, pa ti radi, i mi ćemo raditi.
null.verse 41:6: Reci: "Ja sam čovjek kao i vi, samo - meni se objavljuje da je vaš Bog samo jedan Bog, zato se Njemu iskreno klanjate i od Njega oprosta tražite! A teško onima koji Njemu druge ravnim smatraju,
null.verse 41:7: koji zekat ne daju i koji u onaj svijet ne vjeruju!
null.verse 41:8: One koji vjeruju i dobra djela čine zbilja čeka nagrada neprekidna.
null.verse 41:9: Reci: "Zar, zaista, nećete da vjerujete u Onoga koji je u dva vremenska razdoblja Zemlju stvorio - i još Mu druge ravnim smatrate? To je Gospodar svjetova!"
null.verse 41:10: On je nepomična brda po njoj stvorio i blagoslovljenom je učinio i proizvode njezine na njoj odredio, sve to u četiri vremenska razdoblja - ovo je objašnjenje za one koji pitaju,
null.verse 41:11: zatim se nebeskim visinama uputio dok je nebo još maglina bilo, pa njemu i Zemlji rekao: "Pojavite se milom ili silom!" - "Pojavljujemo se drage volje!" - odgovorili su,
null.verse 41:12: pa ih u dva vremenska razdoblja, kao sedam nebesa, stvorio, i odredio šta će se u svakom nebu nalaziti.
null.verse 41:13: A ako glave okrenu, ti reci: "Opominjem vas munjom onakvom kakva je pogodila Ada i Semuda,
null.verse 41:14: kada su im sa svih strana poslanici njihovi dolazili i govorili: "Ne klanjajte se nikome do Allahu!" - a oni odgovarali: "Da je Gospodar naš htio, On bi meleke poslao, mi ne vjerujemo u ono što je po vama poslano.
null.verse 41:15: Ad se bez ikakva osnova bio na Zemlji uzoholio.
null.verse 41:16: I Mi poslasmo protiv njih, u danima nesretnim, vjetar leden, da bismo im još na ovome svijetu dali da osjete sramnu patnju - patnja na onom svijetu biće, zaista, još sramnija - i niko im neće u pomoć priteći.
null.verse 41:17: I Semudu smo na Pravi put ukazivali, ali, njima je bila milija sljepoća od Pravog puta, pa ih je stigla sramna kazna od munje, prema onome kako su zaslužili,
null.verse 41:18: a one koji su vjerovali i Allaha se bojali Mi smo spasili.
null.verse 41:19: A na Dan kad Allahovi neprijatelji u vatru budu potjerani - oni prvi biće zadržani, da bi ih sustigli ostali -
null.verse 41:20: i kad dođu do nje, uši njihove, i oči njihove, i kože njihove svedočiće protiv njih o onome što su radili.
null.verse 41:21: Zašto svjedočite protiv nas! - upitaće oni kože svoje.
null.verse 41:22: Vi se niste krili zato da ne bi uši vaše i oči vaše i kože vaše protiv vas svjedočile, već zato što ste vjerovali da Allah neće saznati mnogo štošta što ste radili.
null.verse 41:23: I to vaše uvjerenje, koje ste o Gospodaru svome imali, upropastilo vas je, i sada ste nastradali.
null.verse 41:24: Pa i ako budu trpjeli, njihovo boravište će Vatra biti; a ako budu tražili naklonost Allahovu, njihovoj molbi neće se udovoljiti.
null.verse 41:25: Mi smo im bili odredili loše drugove koji su im lijepim prikazivali i ono što su uradili i ono što će uraditi, i na njima se obistinilo ono što je rečeno za narode, džine i ljude koji su prije njih bili i nestali - doist
null.verse 41:26: Oni koji ne vjeruju govore: "Ne slušajte ovaj Kur’an, nego pravite buku da biste ga nadvikali!"
null.verse 41:27: Zato ćemo Mi, sigurno, dati da nevjernici iskuse nesnosnu patnju, i kaznićemo ih najgorom kaznom za djela koja su počinili.
null.verse 41:28: To je kazna za Allahove neprijatelje, vatra u kojoj će im vječna kuća biti, kao naplata što su dokaze Naše stalno poricali.
null.verse 41:29: I nevjernici će reći: "Gospodaru naš, pokaži nam džine i ljude, one koji su nas zaveli, da ih stavimo pod noge naše, neka budu najdonji.
null.verse 41:30: Onima koji govore: "Gospodar naš je Allah" - pa poslije ostanu pri tome - dolaze meleki: "Ne bojte se i ne žalostite se, i radujte se Džennetu koji vam je obećan.
null.verse 41:31: Mi smo zaštitnici vaši u životu na ovome svijetu, a i na onome; u njemu ćete imati sve ono što duše vaše zažele, i što god zatražite - imaćete,
null.verse 41:32: bićete počašćeni od Onoga koji prašta i koji je milostiv.
null.verse 41:33: A ko govori ljepše od onoga koji poziva Allahu, koji dobra djela čini i koji govori: "Ja sam doista musliman!"
null.verse 41:34: Dobro i zlo nisu isto! Zlo dobrim uzvrati, pa će ti dušmanin tvoj odjednom prisni prijatelj postati.
null.verse 41:35: To mogu postići samo strpljivi; to mogu postići samo vrlo sretni.
null.verse 41:36: A kad šejtan pokuša da te na zle misli navede, ti zatraži utočište u Allaha, jer On, uistinu, sve čuje i zna sve.
null.verse 41:37: Među znamenjima Njegovim su noć i dan, i Sunce i Mjesec.
null.verse 41:38: A ako oni neće da te poslušaju - pa, oni koji su kod Gospodara tvoga hvale Ga i noću i danju i ne dosađuju se.
null.verse 41:39: Jedno od znamenja Njegovih je i to što ti vidiš suhu zemlju, a kad na nju spustimo kišu, ona se pokrene i uzbuja.
null.verse 41:40: Oni koji riječi naše izvrću neće se, doista, od Nas sakriti.
null.verse 41:41: Oni koji ne vjeruju u Kur’an, pošto im je objavljen.
null.verse 41:42: laž joj je strana, bilo s koje strane, ona je Objava od Mudroga i hvale dostojnoga.
null.verse 41:43: Tebi se neće reći ništa što već nije rečeno poslanicima prije tebe.
null.verse 41:44: A da Kur’an objavljujemo na tuđem jeziku, oni bi, sigurno, rekli: "Trebalo je da su mu ajeti razumljivi.
null.verse 41:45: I Musau smo Knjigu dali, pa su se zbog nje podvojili.
null.verse 41:46: Ko čini dobro, u svoju korist čini, a ko radi zlo, na svoju štetu radi.
null.verse 41:47: Samo On zna kada će smak svijeta nastupiti.
null.verse 41:48: I neće biti onih kojima su se prije klanjali i uvjeriće se da ne mogu nikud umaći.
null.verse 41:49: Čovjeku ne dosadi da bogatstvo traži, a kada ga neimaština zadesi, onda zdvaja i nadu gubi.
null.verse 41:50: Kad ga obaspemo milošću Našom, poslije nesreće koja ga zadesi, on govori: "Ovo sam i zaslužio i ja ne mislim da će Čas oživljenja doći.
null.verse 41:51: Kada čovjeku milost Našu darujemo, postaje nezahvalan i uzoholi se, a kada ga nevolja dotakne, onda se dugo moli.
null.verse 41:52: Reci: "Šta mislite, ako je Kur’an od Allaha, a vi u nj nećete da vjerujete - ko je onda u većoj zabludi od onoga koji je u protivrječju dalekom od istine?"
null.verse 41:53: Mi ćemo im pružati dokaze Naše u prostranstvima svemirskim, a i u njima samim, dok im ne bude sasvim jasno da je Kur’an istina.
null.verse 41:54: Oni sumnjaju da će pred Gospodara svoga stati, a On znanjem Svojim obuhvaća sve.

null.verse 41:2: এটা অবতীর্ণ পরম করুণাময়, দয়ালুর পক্ষ থেকে।
null.verse 41:3: এটা কিতাব, এর আয়াতসমূহ বিশদভাবে বিবৃত আরবী কোরআনরূপে জ্ঞানী লোকদের জন্য।
null.verse 41:4: সুসংবাদদাতা ও সতর্ককারীরূপে, অতঃপর তাদের অধিকাংশই মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিয়েছে, তারা শুনে না।
null.verse 41:5: তারা বলে আপনি যে বিষয়ের দিকে আমাদের কে দাওয়াত দেন, সে বিষয়ে আমাদের অন্তর আবরণে আবৃত, আমাদের কর্ণে আছে বোঝা এবং আমাদের ও আপনার মাঝখানে আছে অন্তরাল। অতএব, আপনি আপনার কাজ করুন এবং আমরা আমাদের কাজ করি।
null.verse 41:6: বলুন, আমিও তোমাদের মতই মানুষ, আমার প্রতি ওহী আসে যে, তোমাদের মাবুদ একমাত্র মাবুদ, অতএব তাঁর দিকেই সোজা হয়ে থাক এবং তাঁর কাছে ক্ষমা প্রার্থনা কর। আর মুশরিকদের জন্যে রয়েছে দুর্ভোগ,
null.verse 41:7: যারা যাকাত দেয় না এবং পরকালকে অস্বীকার করে।
null.verse 41:8: নিশ্চয় যারা বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করে ও সৎকর্ম করে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে অফুরন্ত পুরস্কার।
null.verse 41:9: বলুন, তোমরা কি সে সত্তাকে অস্বীকার কর যিনি পৃথিবী সৃষ্টি করেছেন দু’দিনে এবং তোমরা কি তাঁর সমকক্ষ স্থীর কর? তিনি তো সমগ্র বিশ্বের পালনকর্তা।
null.verse 41:10: তিনি পৃথিবীতে উপরিভাগে অটল পর্বতমালা স্থাপন করেছেন, তাতে কল্যাণ নিহিত রেখেছেন এবং চার দিনের মধ্যে তাতে তার খাদ্যের ব্যবস্থা করেছেন-পূর্ণ হল জিজ্ঞাসুদের জন্যে।
null.verse 41:11: অতঃপর তিনি আকাশের দিকে মনোযোগ দিলেন যা ছিল ধুম্রকুঞ্জ, অতঃপর তিনি তাকে ও পৃথিবীকে বললেন, তোমরা উভয়ে আস ইচ্ছায় অথবা অনিচ্ছায়। তারা বলল, আমরা স্বেচ্ছায় আসলাম।
null.verse 41:12: অতঃপর তিনি আকাশমন্ডলীকে দু’দিনে সপ্ত আকাশ করে দিলেন এবং প্রত্যেক আকাশে তার আদেশ প্রেরণ করলেন। আমি নিকটবর্তী আকাশকে প্রদীপমালা দ্বারা সুশোভিত ও সংরক্ষিত করেছি। এটা পরাক্রমশালী সর্বজ্ঞ আল্লাহর ব্যবস্থাপনা।
null.verse 41:13: অতঃপর যদি তারা মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয়, তবে বলুন, আমি তোমাদেরকে সতর্ক করলাম এক কঠোর আযাব সম্পর্কে আদ ও সামুদের আযাবের মত।
null.verse 41:14: যখন তাদের কাছে রসূলগণ এসেছিলেন সম্মুখ দিক থেকে এবং পিছন দিক থেকে এ কথা বলতে যে, তোমরা আল্লাহ ব্যতীত কারও পূজা করো না। তারা বলেছিল, আমাদের পালনকর্তা ইচ্ছা করলে অবশ্যই ফেরেশতা প্রেরণ করতেন, অতএব, আমরা তোমাদের আনীত বিষয় অমান্য করলাম।
null.verse 41:15: যারা ছিল আদ, তারা পৃথিবীতে অযথা অহংকার করল এবং বলল, আমাদের অপেক্ষা অধিক শক্তিধর কে? তারা কি লক্ষ্য করেনি যে, যে আল্লাহ তাদেরকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন, তিনি তাদের অপেক্ষা অধিক শক্তিধর ? বস্তুতঃ তারা আমার নিদর্শনাবলী অস্বীকার করত।
null.verse 41:16: অতঃপর আমি তাদেরকে পার্থিব জীবনে লাঞ্ছনার আযাব আস্বাদন করানোর জন্যে তাদের উপর প্রেরণ করলাম ঝঞ্ঝাবায়ু বেশ কতিপয় অশুভ দিনে। আর পরকালের আযাব তো আরও লাঞ্ছনাকর এমতাবস্থায় যে, তারা সাহায্যপ্রাপ্ত হবে না।
null.verse 41:17: আর যারা সামূদ, আমি তাদেরকে প্রদর্শন করেছিলাম, অতঃপর তারা সৎপথের পরিবর্তে অন্ধ থাকাই পছন্দ করল। অতঃপর তাদের কৃতকর্মের কারণে তাদেরকে অবমাননাকর আযাবের বিপদ এসে ধৃত করল।
null.verse 41:18: যারা বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করেছিল ও সাবধানে চলত, আমি তাদেরকে উদ্ধার করলাম।
null.verse 41:19: যেদিন আল্লাহর শত্রুদেরকে অগ্নিকুন্ডের দিকে ঠেলে নেওয়া হবে। এবং ওদের বিন্যস্ত করা হবে বিভিন্ন দলে।
null.verse 41:20: তারা যখন জাহান্নামের কাছে পৌঁছাবে, তখন তাদের কান, চক্ষু ও ত্বক তাদের কর্ম সম্পর্কে সাক্ষ্য দেবে।
null.verse 41:21: তারা তাদের ত্বককে বলবে, তোমরা আমাদের বিপক্ষে সাক্ষ্য দিলে কেন? তারা বলবে, যে আল্লাহ সব কিছুকে বাকশক্তি দিয়েছেন, তিনি আমাদেরকেও বাকশক্তি দিয়েছেন। তিনিই তোমাদেরকে প্রথমবার সৃষ্টি করেছেন এবং তোমরা তাঁরই দিকে প্রত্যাবর্তিত হবে।
null.verse 41:22: তোমাদের কান, তোমাদের চক্ষু এবং তোমাদের ত্বক তোমাদের বিপক্ষে সাক্ষ্য দেবে না ধারণার বশবর্তী হয়ে তোমরা তাদের কাছে কিছু গোপন করতে না। তবে তোমাদের ধারণা ছিল যে, তোমরা যা কর তার অনেক কিছুই আল্লাহ জানেন না।
null.verse 41:23: তোমাদের পালনকর্তা সম্বন্ধে তোমাদের এ ধারণাই তোমাদেরকে ধ্বংস করেছে। ফলে তোমরা ক্ষতিগ্রস্তদের অন্তর্ভুক্ত হয়ে গেছ।
null.verse 41:24: অতঃপর যদি তারা সবর করে, তবুও জাহান্নামই তাদের আবাসস্থল। আর যদি তারা ওযরখাহী করে, তবে তাদের ওযর কবুল করা হবে না।
null.verse 41:25: আমি তাদের পেছনে সঙ্গী লাগিয়ে দিয়েছিলাম, অতঃপর সঙ্গীরা তাদের অগ্র-পশ্চাতের আমল তাদের দৃষ্টিতে শোভনীয় করে দিয়েছিল। তাদের ব্যাপারেও শাস্তির আদেশ বাস্তবায়িত হল, যা বাস্তবায়িত হয়েছিল তাদের পূর্ববতী জিন ও মানুষের ব্যাপারে। নিশ্চয় তারা ক্ষতিগ্রস্ত।
null.verse 41:26: আর কাফেররা বলে, তোমরা এ কোরআন শ্রবণ করো না এবং এর আবৃত্তিতে হঞ্জগোল সৃষ্টি কর, যাতে তোমরা জয়ী হও।
null.verse 41:27: আমি অবশ্যই কাফেরদেরকে কঠিন আযাব আস্বাদন করাব এবং আমি অবশ্যই তাদেরকে তাদের মন্দ ও হীন কাজের প্রতিফল দেব।
null.verse 41:28: এটা আল্লাহর শত্রুদের শাস্তি-জাহান্নাম। তাতে তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে স্থায়ী আবাস, আমার আয়াতসমূহ অস্বীকার করার প্রতিফলস্বরূপ।
null.verse 41:29: কাফেররা বলবে, হে আমাদের পালনকর্তা! যেসব জিন ও মানুষ আমাদেরকে পথভ্রষ্ট করেছিল, তাদেরকে দেখিয়ে দাও, আমরা তাদেরকে পদদলিত করব, যাতে তারা যথেষ্ট অপমানিত হয়।
null.verse 41:30: নিশ্চয় যারা বলে, আমাদের পালনকর্তা আল্লাহ, অতঃপর তাতেই অবিচল থাকে, তাদের কাছে ফেরেশতা অবতীর্ণ হয় এবং বলে, তোমরা ভয় করো না, চিন্তা করো না এবং তোমাদের প্রতিশ্রুত জান্নাতের সুসংবাদ শোন।
null.verse 41:31: ইহকালে ও পরকালে আমরা তোমাদের বন্ধু। সেখানে তোমাদের জন্য আছে যা তোমাদের মন চায় এবং সেখানে তোমাদের জন্যে আছে তোমরা দাবী কর।
null.verse 41:32: এটা ক্ষমাশীল করুনাময়ের পক্ষ থেকে সাদর আপ্যায়ন।
null.verse 41:33: যে আল্লাহর দিকে দাওয়াত দেয়, সৎকর্ম করে এবং বলে, আমি একজন আজ্ঞাবহ, তার কথা অপেক্ষা উত্তম কথা আর কার?
null.verse 41:34: সমান নয় ভাল ও মন্দ। জওয়াবে তাই বলুন যা উৎকৃষ্ট। তখন দেখবেন আপনার সাথে যে ব্যক্তির শুত্রুতা রয়েছে, সে যেন অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু।
null.verse 41:35: এ চরিত্র তারাই লাভ করে, যারা সবর করে এবং এ চরিত্রের অধিকারী তারাই হয়, যারা অত্যন্ত ভাগ্যবান।
null.verse 41:36: যদি শয়তানের পক্ষ থেকে আপনি কিছু কুমন্ত্রণা অনুভব করেন, তবে আল্লাহর শরণাপন্ন হোন। নিশ্চয় তিনি সর্বশ্রোতা, সর্বজ্ঞ।
null.verse 41:37: তাঁর নিদর্শনসমূহের মধ্যে রয়েছে দিবস, রজনী, সূর্য ও চন্দ্র। তোমরা সূর্যকে সেজদা করো না, চন্দ্রকেও না; আল্লাহকে সেজদা কর, যিনি এগুলো সৃষ্টি করেছেন, যদি তোমরা নিষ্ঠার সাথে শুধুমাত্র তাঁরই এবাদত কর।
null.verse 41:38: অতঃপর তারা যদি অহংকার করে, তবে যারা আপনার পালনকর্তার কাছে আছে, তারা দিবারাত্রি তাঁর পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করে এবং তারা ক্লান্ত হয় না। [ Sajdah ]
null.verse 41:39: তাঁর এক নিদর্শন এই যে, তুমি ভূমিকে দেখবে অনুর্বর পড়ে আছে। অতঃপর আমি যখন তার উপর বৃষ্টি বর্ষণ করি, তখন সে শস্যশ্যামল ও স্ফীত হয়। নিশ্চয় যিনি একে জীবিত করেন, তিনি জীবিত করবেন মৃতদেরকেও। নিশ্চয় তিনি সবকিছু করতে সক্ষম।
null.verse 41:40: নিশ্চয় যারা আমার আয়াতসমূহের ব্যাপারে বক্রতা অবলম্বন করে, তারা আমার কাছে গোপন নয়। যে ব্যক্তি জাহান্নামে নিক্ষিপ্ত হবে সে শ্রেষ্ঠ, না যে কেয়ামতের দিন নিরাপদে আসবে? তোমরা যা ইচ্ছা কর, নিশ্চয় তিনি দেখেন যা তোমরা কর।
null.verse 41:41: নিশ্চয় যারা কোরআন আসার পর তা অস্বীকার করে, তাদের মধ্যে চিন্তা-ভাবনার অভাব রয়েছে। এটা অবশ্যই এক সম্মানিত গ্রন্থ।
null.verse 41:42: এতে মিথ্যার প্রভাব নেই, সামনের দিক থেকেও নেই এবং পেছন দিক থেকেও নেই। এটা প্রজ্ঞাময়, প্রশংসিত আল্লাহর পক্ষ থেকে অবতীর্ণ।
null.verse 41:43: আপনাকে তো তাই বলা হয়, যা বলা হত পূর্ববর্তী রসূলগনকে। নিশ্চয় আপনার পালনকর্তার কাছে রয়েছে ক্ষমা এবং রয়েছে যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তি।
null.verse 41:44: আমি যদি একে অনারব ভাষায় কোরআন করতাম, তবে অবশ্যই তারা বলত, এর আয়াতসমূহ পরিস্কার ভাষায় বিবৃত হয়নি কেন? কি আশ্চর্য যে, কিতাব অনারব ভাষায় আর রসূল আরবী ভাষী! বলুন, এটা বিশ্বাসীদের জন্য হেদায়েত ও রোগের প্রতিকার। যারা মুমিন নয়, তাদের কানে আছে ছিপি, আর কোরআন তাদের জন্যে অন্ধত্ব। তাদেরকে যেন দূরবর্তী স্থান থেকে আহবান করা হয়।
null.verse 41:45: আমি মূসাকে কিতাব দিয়েছিলাম, অতঃপর তাতে মতভেদ সৃষ্টি হয়। আপনার পালনকর্তার পক্ষ থেকে পূর্ব সিদ্ধান্ত না থাকলে তাদের মধ্যে ফয়সালা হয়ে যেত। তারা কোরআন সমন্ধে এক অস্বস্তিকর সন্দেহে লিপ্ত।
null.verse 41:46: যে সৎকর্ম করে, সে নিজের উপকারের জন্যেই করে, আর যে অসৎকর্ম করে, তা তার উপরই বর্তাবে। আপনার পালনকর্তা বান্দাদের প্রতি মোটেই যুলুম করেন না।
null.verse 41:47: কেয়ামতের জ্ঞান একমাত্র তাঁরই জানা। তাঁর জ্ঞানের বাইরে কোন ফল আবরণমুক্ত হয় না। এবং কোন নারী গর্ভধারণ ও সন্তান প্রসব করে না। যেদিন আল্লাহ তাদেরকে ডেকে বলবেন, আমার শরীকরা কোথায়? সেদিন তারা বলবে, আমরা আপনাকে বলে দিয়েছি যে, আমাদের কেউ এটা স্বীকার করে না।
null.verse 41:48: পূর্বে তারা যাদের পূজা করত, তারা উধাও হয়ে যাবে এবং তারা বুঝে নেবে যে, তাদের কোন নিস্কৃতি নেই।
null.verse 41:49: মানুষ উন্নতি কামনায় ক্লান্ত হয় না; যদি তাকে অমঙ্গল স্পর্শ করে, তবে সে সম্পূর্ণ রূপে নিরাশ হয়ে পড়ে।
null.verse 41:50: বিপদাপদ স্পর্শ করার পর আমি যদি তাকে আমার অনুগ্রহ আস্বাদন করাই, তখন সে বলতে থাকে, এটা যে আমার যোগ্য প্রাপ্য; আমি মনে করি না যে, কেয়ামত সংঘটিত হবে। আমি যদি আমার পালনকর্তার কাছে ফিরে যাই, তবে অবশ্যই তার কাছে আমার জন্য কল্যাণ রয়েছে। অতএব, আমি কাফেরদেরকে তাদের কর্ম সম্পর্কে অবশ্যই অবহিত করব এবং তাদেরকে অবশ্যই আস্বাদন করাব কঠিন শাস্তি।
null.verse 41:51: আমি যখন মানুষের প্রতি অনুগ্রহ করি তখন সে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয় এবং পার্শ্ব পরিবর্তন করে। আর যখন তাকে অনিষ্ট স্পর্শ করে, তখন সুদীর্ঘ দোয়া করতে থাকে।
null.verse 41:52: বলুন, তোমরা ভেবে দেখেছ কি, যদি এটা আল্লাহর পক্ষ থেকে হয়, অতঃপর তোমরা একে অমান্য কর, তবে যে ব্যক্তি ঘোর বিরোধিতায় লিপ্ত, তার চাইতে অধিক পথভ্রষ্ট আর কে?
null.verse 41:53: এখন আমি তাদেরকে আমার নিদর্শনাবলী প্রদর্শন করাব পৃথিবীর দিগন্তে এবং তাদের নিজেদের মধ্যে; ফলে তাদের কাছে ফুটে উঠবে যে, এ কোরআন সত্য। আপনার পালনকর্তা সর্ববিষয়ে সাক্ষ্যদাতা, এটা কি যথেষ্ট নয়?
null.verse 41:54: শুনে রাখ, তারা তাদের পালনকর্তার সাথে সাক্ষাতের ব্যাপারে সন্দেহে পতিত রয়েছে। শুনে রাখ, তিনি সবকিছুকে পরিবেষ্টন করে রয়েছেন। নয়?

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:3: Книга, знаменията на която са разяснени - Коран на арабски за хора проумяващи -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:5: И казват: Сърцата ни имат броня срещу онова, към което ни зовеш, и в ушите ни има глухота.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:6: Кажи [о, Мухаммад]: Аз съм само човек като вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:7: които не дават милостинята закат и отвъдния живот отричат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:8: А за онези, които вярват и вършат праведни дела, ще има безспирна награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:9: Кажи: Нима наистина отричате Онзи, Който сътвори земята в два дни и сторвате Нему подобия? Той е Господът на световете.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:10: И стори по нея непоклатими планини, и я благослови, и разпредели там препитанието й точно в четири дни поравно - за търсещите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:11: После се насочи към [сътворяването на] небето, а то бе дим, и рече на него и на земята: Покорете се доброволно или по принуда! Рекоха: Покоряваме се доброволно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:12: И ги направи седем небеса в два дни, и отреди Той на всяко небе неговото дело.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:13: А ако се отвърнат, кажи: Предупреждавам ви с мълния, подобна на мълнията за адитите и самудяните.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:14: Пратениците дойдоха при тях и отпред, и отзад: Не служете на друг освен на Аллах! Рекоха: Ако нашият Господ бе пожелал, щеше да спусне ангели.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:15: А адитите се възгордяха на земята без право и казаха: Кой е по-силен от нас? Нима не виждат, че Аллах, Който ги сътвори, е по-силен от тях? Така те отричаха Нашите знамения.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:16: И затова изпратихме срещу им леден вихър в злополучни дни, за да ги накараме да вкусят мъчението на позора в земния живот.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:17: И самудяните напътихме, но те предпочетоха слепотата пред напътствието.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:18: И спасихме онези, които повярваха и бяха богобоязливи.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:19: В Деня, когато враговете на Аллах бъдат събрани за Огъня, те ще бъдат подредени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:20: Когато стигнат там, и слухът, и зрението, и кожата им ще свидетелстват против тях за онова, което са вършили.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:21: И ще кажат на кожата си: Защо засвидетелства против нас? Ще каже: Накара ме да говоря Аллах, Който кара всяко нещо да проговори.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:22: И не се опасявахте, че и слухът, и зрението, и кожата ви ще свидетелстват за вас, а предполагахте, че Аллах не ще узнае много от онова, което правите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:23: Тази ваша догадка, която допускахте за вашия Господ, ви донесе гибел и така се озовахте сред губещите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:24: Дори да търпят, обиталището им е Огънят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:25: И им отредихме приятели, които им разкрасяваха всичко пред тях и всичко зад тях.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:26: И казваха неверниците: Не слушайте този Коран и вдигайте глъчка там, [където го четат], за да надвиете вие!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:27: Ще накараме Ние неверниците да вкусят сурово мъчение и ще им въздадем за лошите им деяния.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:28: Това е възмездието за враговете на Аллах - Огънят - Вечният дом за тях - възмездие, защото отхвърляха Нашите знамения!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:29: И ще кажат неверниците: Господи наш, покажи ни онези от джиновете и хората, които ни заблудиха, да ги сложим под краката си, та да бъдат най-отдолу [в Ада]!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:30: При онези, които казват: Аллах е нашият Господ! и следват правия път, ангелите ще слязат: Не се страхувайте и не скърбете! И се радвайте на Рая, който ви е обещан!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:31: Ние сме вашите покровители и в земния живот, и в отвъдния.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:33: И кой има по-хубаво слово от онзи, който зове към Аллах и върши праведни дела, и казва: Аз съм отдаден!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:34: Не са равни добрината и злината.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:35: Но с това са удостоени само търпеливите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:36: И ако те подбуди сатаната, при Аллах търси убежище! Той е Всечуващия, Всезнаещия.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:37: И от Неговите знамения са нощта и денят, и слънцето, и луната.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:40: които са при твоя Господ, Го прославят нощем и денем, и това не им дотяга.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:41: И от Неговите знамения е, че виждаш земята безжизнена.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:42: Онези, които изопачават Нашите знамения, не са скрити за Нас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:43: Онези, които не вярват в Напомнянето, след като дойде при тях.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:44: която лъжа не я доближава нито отпред, нито отзад, и е низпослание от премъдър, всеславен.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:45: Не ти се казва [от неверниците] друго освен каквото бе казано на пратениците преди теб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:46: А ако го сторехме Коран на чужд език,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:47: щяха да рекат: Защо знаменията му не са разяснени?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:49: арабин? Кажи: За вярващите той е напътствие и изцеление, а онези, които не вярват, имат в ушите си глухота и той за
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:50: И на Муса дадохме Писанието, и настана разногласие по него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:51: Който върши праведни дела, то е за самия него, а който стори зло, то е в негов ущърб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:52: При Него е знанието за Часа.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:53: И ще изчезне от тях онова, което зовяха преди, и ще се убедят, че няма за тях избавление.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:54: Не му дотяга на човека да зове доброто, а засегне ли го злото, той се отчайва, унива.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:55: А дадем ли му да вкуси милост от Нас подир беда, която го е засегнала, казва: Аз заслужавам това и не мисля, че ще настъпи Часът.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:56: И щом облагодетелстваме човек, той се отдръпва и се възгордява.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:59: е от Аллах, а вие после го отхвърляте, кой ще е по-заблуден от онзи, който е в дълбок раздор?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:60: Ще им покажем Нашите знамения по хоризонтите и в тях самите, додето им се изясни, че това е истината.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 41:61: Съмняват се в срещата със своя Господ.

null.verse 41:2: 這是從至仁至慈的主降下的啟示。
null.verse 41:3: 這是一部節文詳明的天經，是為有知識的民眾而降示的阿拉伯文的（《古蘭經》），
null.verse 41:4: 可以做報喜者和警告者；但他們大半退避而不肯聽從。
null.verse 41:5: 他們說：「我們的心在蒙蔽中，不能了解你對我們的教導，我們的耳朵有重聽；在我們和你之間有一道屏障。你幹你的吧，我們必定要幹我們的！」
null.verse 41:6: 你說：「我跟你們一樣，只是一個凡人，我奉到啟示：「你們所應當崇拜的，只是獨一的主宰。所以你們應當遵正路而趨向他，應當向他求饒。」傷哉以物配主者！
null.verse 41:7: 他們不納天課，不信後世。
null.verse 41:8: 信道而且行善者必受不斷的報酬。
null.verse 41:9: 你說：「你們真不信在兩日內創造大地者，而要為他樹立許多匹敵嗎？那是全世界的主。」
null.verse 41:10: 他在大地上創造許多山岳，他降福於大地，並預定大地上眾生的食物。那些事，在整整的四天就完成了。那是用來答覆詢問者的。
null.verse 41:11: 然後，他志於造天，那時，天還是蒸氣。他對天地說：「你們倆順服地，或勉強地來吧！」它倆說：「我們倆順服地來了。」
null.verse 41:12: 他在兩日內創造了七層天，他以他的命令啟示各天的居民，他以眾星點綴最低的天，並加以保護。那是萬能的、全知的主的預定。
null.verse 41:13: 如果他們退避，你就說：「我警告你們一種刑罰，它像阿德人和賽莫德人所受的刑罰一樣。」
null.verse 41:14: 當時，眾使者從他們的前後來臨他們，說：「除真主外，你們不要崇拜任何物。」他們說：「假若我們的主意欲，他必降下許多天神，我們必定不信你們所奉的使命。」
null.verse 41:15: 至於阿德人，他們不該在地方上妄自尊大，他們說：「誰比我們能力更強大呢？」難道他們不知道創造他們的真主比他們更強大嗎？他們否認了我的許多蹟象，
null.verse 41:16: 我使暴風在若干凶日裡傷害他們，使他們在今世生活中嘗試凌辱的刑罰，而後世的刑罰，確是更凌辱的，他們將不獲援助。
null.verse 41:17: 至於賽莫德人，則我曾引導他們，但他們捨正道而取迷誤，故凌辱的刑罰的霹靂因他們的行為而轟擊了他們。
null.verse 41:18: 我曾拯救了信道而敬畏者。
null.verse 41:19: 在那日，真主的敵人將被召集到火獄去。他們是受約束的。
null.verse 41:20: 待他們來到火獄的時候，他們的耳目皮膚將作証他們的行為。
null.verse 41:21: 他們將對自己的皮膚說：「你們為甚麼作不利於我們的見証呢？」它們將說：「能使萬物說話的真主，已使我們說話了。他初次創造你們，你們只被召歸於他。」
null.verse 41:22: 過去，你們沒有防備你們的耳目皮膚會作不利於你們的見証，但你們猜想真主不知道你們所作的許多事情。
null.verse 41:23: 你們對於你們的主所懷的這種猜想已害了你們，故你們變成了虧折者。
null.verse 41:24: 如果他們能忍受，那末，火獄就是他們的住處；如果他們邀恩、原諒，那末，他們絕不得邀恩。
null.verse 41:25: 我已為他們預定許多魔伴，而那些魔伴，以他們生前或死後的事情迷惑他們，他們應當受刑罰的判決，而入於以前逝去的精靈和人類的若干民族之中，而預言對他們實現，他們確是虧折者。
null.verse 41:26: 不信道者說：「你們不要聽這《古蘭經》，你們應當擾亂誦經的聲音，或許你們將獲得勝利。」
null.verse 41:27: 我必使不信道者嘗試嚴厲的刑罰，我必以最劣的報酬報答他們的罪惡。
null.verse 41:28: 那就是真主的敵人所受的報酬——火獄，他們在火獄中有永久的住宅，那是因為報酬他們否認我的蹟象。
null.verse 41:29: 不信道者說：「我們的主啊！求你昭示我們那些曾使我們迷誤的精靈和人類，讓我們將他們踏在我們的腳下，以便他們變成最下賤的。」
null.verse 41:30: 凡說過「我們的主是真主」，然後遵循正道者，眾天神將來臨他們，說：「你們不要恐懼，不要憂愁，你們應當為你們被預許的樂園而高興。
null.verse 41:31: 在今世和後世，我們都是你們的保護者。你們在樂園裡將享受你們所愛好的一切，你們在樂園裡將享受你們所要求的一切。
null.verse 41:32: 那是至仁至慈的主所賜的宴饗。」
null.verse 41:33: 召人信仰真主，力行善功，並且說：「我確是穆斯林」的人，在言辭方面，有誰比他更優美呢？
null.verse 41:34: 善惡不是一樣的。你應當以最優美的品行去對付惡劣的品行，那末，與你相仇者，忽然間會變得親如密友。
null.verse 41:35: 唯堅忍者，獲此美德，唯有大福分者，獲此美德。
null.verse 41:36: 如果惡魔慫恿你，你應當求庇於真主。他確是全聰的，確是全知的。
null.verse 41:37: 晝夜與日月，都是他的蹟象。你們不要向日月叩頭，你們應當向創造那些蹟象的真主叩頭，如果你們是崇拜他的話。
null.verse 41:38: 如果他們自大，那末，在你的主那裡的眾天神，則是晝夜讚頌他，他們並不厭倦的。※
null.verse 41:39: 你看大地是乾枯的，當我降下雨水的時候，它便活動而膨脹起來，這他是他的蹟象。能使大地復活者，必能使死人復活，他對於萬事，確是全能的。
null.verse 41:40: 曲解我的蹟象者，必不能隱匿起來，不讓我看見他們。是在復活日被投入火獄者好呢？還是在復活日安全者好呢？你們要做甚麼，就隨便做甚麼吧！他確是明察你們的行為的。
null.verse 41:41: 不信已降臨的教誨者，我要懲罰他。那教誨確是堅固的經典，
null.verse 41:42: 虛偽不能從它的前後進攻它，它是從至睿的，可頌的主降示的。
null.verse 41:43: 人們對你說的，不過是以往對眾使者說過的讕言，你的主，確是有赦宥的，確是有痛懲的。
null.verse 41:44: 假若我降示一部外國語的《古蘭經》，他們必定會說：「怎麼不解釋其中的節文呢？一部外國語的經典和一個阿拉伯的先知嗎？」你說：「它是信道者的向導和藥方；不信道者聽而不聞，視而不見，因為這些人是從遠處被喊叫的。」
null.verse 41:45: 我確已把天經授予穆薩，但眾人為那天經而分歧，假若沒有一句話從你的主預先發出，他們必受裁判。他們對於它，確是在疑慮之中。
null.verse 41:46: 行善者自受其益，作惡者自受其害。你的主絕不會虧枉眾僕的。
null.verse 41:47: 關於復活時的認識，只歸於他；果實的脫萼，女性的懷孕和分娩，無一不在他的洞鑒中。在那日，他將問他們：「你們妄稱為我的伙伴的，在哪裡呢？」他們將說：「我們報告你，我們中絕沒有一個人能作証這件事。」
null.verse 41:48: 他們生前所祈禱的，將迴避他們，他們將確信自己無所逃罪。
null.verse 41:49: 人祈福不厭，一遭禍患就灰心絕望。
null.verse 41:50: 他遭遇患難之後，如果我使他嘗試從我降下的恩惠，他必定說：「這是我用工作換來的。我不信復活時會到來。如果我被召去見我的主，則我在他那裡必受至善的報酬。」我必將不信道者的行為告訴他們，我必使他們嘗試嚴重的刑罰。
null.verse 41:51: 當我施恩於人的時候，他忘恩而自大，當他遭遇禍患的時候，他祈禱不絕。
null.verse 41:52: 你說：「你們告訴我吧！如果《古蘭經》是從真主那裡降示的，而你們不信它，那末，有誰比長遠違背真理者更迷誤呢？」
null.verse 41:53: 我將在四方和在他們自身中，把我的許多蹟象昭示他們，直到他們明白《古蘭經》確是真理。難道你的主能見証萬物還不夠嗎？
null.verse 41:54: 真的，他們的確懷疑將來是否要與他們的主會面。真的，他確是周知萬物的。 我將在四方和在他們自身中，把我的許多蹟象昭示他們，直到他們明白《古蘭經》確是真理。難道你的主能見証萬物還不夠嗎？

null.verse 41:2: Seslání od Milosrdného, slitovného,
null.verse 41:3: Písmo, jehož verše byly učiněny srozumitelnými pro lidi znalé v podobě Koránu arabského!
null.verse 41:5: a hovoří: "Srdce naše jsou zacloněna vůči tomu, k čemu vyzýváš, a v uších našich je hluchota a mezi námi i tebou závěs visí.
null.verse 41:6: Rci: "Já jen smrtelník jsem jako vy a bylo mi pouze vnuknuto, že božstvem vaším je Bůh jediný.
null.verse 41:7: almužnu nedávají a v život posmrtný nevěří!"
null.verse 41:8: Věru těm, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali, těm dostane se odměny neupomínané.
null.verse 41:9: Rci: "Vy vskutku nebudete věřit v toho, jenž stvořil zemi ve dvou dnech, a přidávat mu chcete podobné? On Pánem lidstva všeho je!
null.verse 41:10: On umístil na ní pevně zakotvené hory a požehnal ji a rozdělil na ní potravu ve čtyřech dnech pro všechny prosící rovnoměrně.
null.verse 41:11: Potom se k nebi vztyčil, jež dýmem jenom bylo, a pravil jemu i zemi: Pojďte ke mně, ať chcete již, či nechcete! A odpověděly: Půjdeme dobrovolně.
null.verse 41:12: A ustanovil je jako sedm nebes ve dvou dnech a každému nebi pořádek jeho vnukl.
null.verse 41:13: Jestliže se odvrátí, řekni jim: "Já varuji vás před hromobitím podobným tomu, jímž ´Ádovci a Thamúdovci byli zahubeni.
null.verse 41:14: Když poslové k nim přišli zepředu i zezadu hlásajíce, aby neuctívali nikoho kromě Boha, odpověděli: "Kdyby Pán náš chtěl, byl by věru anděly seslal.
null.verse 41:15: Pokud se ´Ádovců týká, ti pyšně po zemi chodili, aniž právo na to měli, a říkali: "Kdo silnější je než my mocí svou?" Což neviděli, že Bůh, jenž je stvořil, daleko silnější než oni je mocí? A přitom popírali ještě znamení Naše.
null.verse 41:16: A vyslali jsme proti nim vichřici svištivou ve dnech neblahých, abychom jim dali okusit trest zahanbující v tomto životě pozemském, však trest života budoucího ještě více zahanbující bude a pomoci se jim nedostane.
null.verse 41:17: A pokud pak se Thamúdovců týká, těm dali jsme správné vedení, však oni více slepotu než vedení milovali a zasáhlo je hromobití trestu potupného za to, co si vysloužili.
null.verse 41:18: A zachránili jsme ty, kdož uvěřili a Boha se báli.
null.verse 41:19: A v den, kdy nepřátelé Boží budou u ohně pekelného shromážděni, budou na skupiny rozděleni,
null.verse 41:20: a když pak k němu přijdou, bude proti nim svědčit sluch a zrak i kůže jejich o tom, co činili.
null.verse 41:21: A zeptají se kůží svých: "Proč proti nám svědčíte?" I odvětí: "Bůh, jenž věci každé promluvit dává, nám slovo udělil a On poprvé vás stvořil a k Němu budete navráceni.
null.verse 41:22: A nemohli jste se skrýt tak, aby proti vám sluchy a zraky i kůže vaše dnes nesvědčily, a domnívali jste se, že Bůh nezví mnohé z toho, co jste dělali.
null.verse 41:23: Tato domněnka vaše, již jste si o Pánu svém utvořili, vás do záhuby přivedla a stali jste se těmi, kdož ztrátu utrpěli.
null.verse 41:24: Jestliže v tomto setrvají, stane se oheň útulkem jejich, a budou-li i prosit o slitováni, nebudou vyslyšeni.
null.verse 41:25: A určili jsme jim druhy věrné, kteří okrášlili pro ně jich skutky minulé i současné, a uskutečnil se nad nimi rozkaz o národech džinů a lidí, jež zmizely již před nimi! A také oni jsou ztraceni.
null.verse 41:26: Ti, kdož nevěří, říkají: "Neposlouchejte tento Korán, nýbrž přehlušujte jej nadávkami - snad nad ním zvítězíte!"
null.verse 41:27: My však dáme věru okusit těm, kdo nevěřili, trestu strašného a odměníme je podle skutku jejich nejhoršího.
null.verse 41:28: Toto bude odměna nepřátel Božích: oheň, v němž příbytek budou mít věčný v odměnu za to, že znamení Naše popírali.
null.verse 41:29: A řeknou pak ti, kdož nevěří: "Pane náš, ukaž nám ty, kdož zbloudit nám dali, ať džinové jsou to již, či lidé! My umístíme je pod nohy své, aby nejnižšími se stali.
null.verse 41:30: K těm pak, kdož říkali: "Pánem naším je Bůh," a potom se přímo ubírali, andělé sestoupí hovoříce: "Nebojte se a nermuťte se, nýbrž radujte se z ráje, jenž byl vám přislíben!
null.verse 41:31: My ochránci jsme vašimi v pozemském i budoucím životě; a budete mít v něm to, po čem duše vaše touží, a dostane se vám tam, oč požádáte, všeho,
null.verse 41:32: jako pohoštění od odpouštějícího, slitovného.
null.verse 41:33: Kdo krásněji hovoří než ten, jenž k službě Bohu vyzývá, zbožné skutky koná a prohlašuje: "Já k těm, kdož do vůle Jeho se odevzdali, patřím.
null.verse 41:34: Dobré a špatné skutky si nejsou rovné; odplácej tím, co lepší je, a hle, ten, mezi nímž a tebou bylo nepřátelství, se stane jakoby přítelem horoucím.
null.verse 41:35: Však dostane se toho pouze těm, kdož trpěliví jsou, a dosáhnou toho jen vlastníci velikého štěstí.
null.verse 41:36: A jestliže tě satan pokušením dráždí, pros Boha o ochranu, vždyť On slyšící je i vševědoucí.
null.verse 41:37: Ke znamením Jeho patří noc i den, slunce i měsíc, však neklaňte se ani slunci, ani měsíci, nýbrž padejte na tvář svou před Bohem, jenž obojí stvořil, jestliže Jej uctíváte.
null.verse 41:38: A jsou-li oni hrdopyšní, pak ti, kdož u Pána tvého jsou, v noci i ve dne Jej slaví neúnavně.
null.verse 41:39: A k znamením Jeho patří, že vidíš zem zvadlou, však když vodu na ni sešleme, tu rozhýbá se a rozbují.
null.verse 41:40: Ti, kdož znamení Naše neuznávají, nejsou nikterak skryti před Námi.
null.verse 41:41: On zná ty, kdož nevěří v připomenutí, když přijde k nim, přestože je to Písmo vzácné
null.verse 41:42: a nic falešného se doň ni zpředu ni zezadu nedostane, vždyť seslání od moudrého, chvályhodného to je!
null.verse 41:43: To, co je ti namítáno, není nic jiného než to, co říkáno bylo poslům před tebou.
null.verse 41:44: Kdybychom je byli učinili Koránem cizojazyčným, věru by byli řekli: "Pročpak nám nebyly učiněny verše jeho srozumitelnými? Je to cizojazyčné, či arabské?" Odpověz: "Korán je pro ty, kdož věří, vedením i vyléčením, zatímco ti, kdož nevěří, mají v uších svých trhlinu a jsou slepí vůči němu; a na ně voláno je z místa dalekého.
null.verse 41:45: A darovali jsme již kdysi Mojžíšovi Písmo, a také o něm byli mínění rozdílného.
null.verse 41:46: Kdo zbožné skutky koná, sám pro sebe tak činí, však kdo zlé koná, sám proti sobě samému tak činí.
null.verse 41:47: A jen Jemu přísluší o Hodině vědění.
null.verse 41:48: A ztratí se jim to, k čemu se dříve modlili, a usoudí, že úniku žádného nemají.
null.verse 41:49: Člověk si vyprošuje dobro neúnavně, však když zlo se ho dotkne, zoufá si a je malomyslný.
null.verse 41:50: A věru dáme-li mu ochutnat milosrdenství Svého poté, co neštěstí se ho dotklo, tu říká: "Tohle mi právem náleží a nedomnívám se, že Hodina jednou udeří.
null.verse 41:51: Když zahrneme člověka dobrodiním Svým, odvrací se a stranou se vzdálí, když však zlé se ho dotkne, tu hned prošení obšírného je plný.
null.verse 41:52: Rci: "Co si myslíte? Jestliže toto od Boha přichází, a vy v to nevěříte, kdo je zbloudilejší než ten, jenž v rozkolu hlubokém dlí?"
null.verse 41:53: Ukážeme jim znamení Svá ve všech světa končinách i v nich samých, dokud se jim jasným nestane, že toto pravdou je.
null.verse 41:54: Což pochybují o tom, že se s Pánem svým setkají? Což ten neobjímá věci všechny ve Svém vědění? věcí?

null.verse 41:2: Een openbaring van de Barmhartige, de Genadevolle.
null.verse 41:3: Een Boek waarvan de verzen zijn verklaard als duidelijke verkondiging voor mensen die kennis bezitten.
null.verse 41:4: Als drager van goede tijding en als waarschuwer.
null.verse 41:5: Zij zeggen: "Onze harten zijn gesluierd voor datgene waartoe gij ons roept en er is doofheid in onze oren en tussen u en ons is een scherm.
null.verse 41:6: Zeg: "Ik ben slechts een mens zoals gij.
null.verse 41:7: Die geen Zakaat geven en aan het Hiernamaals niet geloven.
null.verse 41:8: Wat hen betreft, die geloven en goede werken doen, zij zullen zeker een loon ontvangen dat nooit zal ophouden.
null.verse 41:9: Zeg: "Verwerpt gij werkelijk Hem Die de aarde in twee dagen schiep? En richt gij gelijken aan Hem op, hoewel Hij de Heer der Werelden is?
null.verse 41:10: Hij heeft de bergen daarop gesteld en heeft deze gezegend en er op (de aarde) de voedingsmiddelen bepaald, in vier dagen, gelijkelijk voor de zoekenden.
null.verse 41:11: Dan wendde Hij Zich tot de hemel terwijl deze een soort damp was en zeide hiertegen en tot de aarde: "Komt beiden, willens of onwillens.
null.verse 41:12: Zij zeiden: "Wij komen gewillig.
null.verse 41:13: Maar indien zij zich afwenden, zeg dan: "Ik waarschuw u voor een bliksemstraal, zoals de bliksem die Aad en Samoed achterhaalde.
null.verse 41:14: Toen hun boodschappers van vóór hen en achter hen tot hen kwamen, zeggende: "Aanbidt niets dan God", zeiden zij: "Als onze Heer het had gewild, zou Hij beslist engelen hebben nedergezonden.
null.verse 41:15: Maar de Aad handelden ten onrechte laatdunkend op aarde en zeiden: "Wie is machtiger dan wij?" Wisten zij niet dat God, Die hen schiep machtiger was dan zij? Doch zij plachten Onze tekenen te verwerpen.
null.verse 41:16: Daarom zonden Wij tegen hen een razende wind gedurende verscheidene noodlottige dagen, opdat Wij hen in dit leven de straf der vernedering mochten doen ondergaan.
null.verse 41:17: En wat de Samoed betreft, Wij gaven leiding, maar zij verkozen blindheid boven het rechte pad, daarom trof hen de bliksem van de straf der vernedering, voor hetgeen Zij hadden verdiend.
null.verse 41:18: En Wij redden de gelovigen, die godvruchtig waren;
null.verse 41:19: Op de dag waarop God’s vijanden, in groepen verdeeld naar het Vuur zullen worden gebracht,
null.verse 41:20: Tot zij het bereiken, zullen hun oren, ogen en huiden tegen hen getuigenis afleggen over wat zij plachten te doen.
null.verse 41:21: En zij zullen tot hun huiden zeggen: "Waarom getuigt gij tegen ons?" Deze zullen antwoorden: "God Die alles heeft doen spreken - deed ook ons spreken.
null.verse 41:22: Gij waart niet in staat u te verschuilen, opdat uw oren, uw ogen en uw huiden geen getuigenis tegen u zouden afleggen, maar gij dacht, dat God onbekend was met het geen gij deedt.
null.verse 41:23: En deze gedachte van u, die gij over uw Heer koesterdet, heeft u tot verderf gebracht, daarom behoort gii tot de verliezers.
null.verse 41:24: Indien zij nu volharden, is het Vuur hun tehuis; en als zij om verontschuldiging vragen, behoren zij niet tot hen aan wie deze wordt verleend.
null.verse 41:25: Wij stelden gezellen (duivelen) voor hen aan, die hetgeen vóór hen en achter hen was schoonschijnend maakten, en het woord werd tegen hen van kracht, met de volkeren van djinn en mensen die vóór hen leefden.
null.verse 41:26: En de ongelovigen zeggen: "Luistert niet naar deze Koran, maar maakt leven daarbij opdat gij de overhand moogt krijgen.
null.verse 41:27: Maar Wij zullen zeker de ongelovigen een strenge straf doen toekomen en Wij zullen hun slechtste daden vergelden.
null.verse 41:28: Dat is het loon van God’s vijanden: het Vuur.
null.verse 41:29: En de ongelovigen zullen zeggen: "Onze Heer, toon ons degenen der djinn en der mensen die ons deden dwalen, opdat wij hen onder onze voeten mogen plaatsen zodat zij tot de vernederden behoren.
null.verse 41:30: Voorzeker zij, die zeggen: "Onze Heer is God," en daarin standvastig blijven, op hen zullen de engelen nederdalen: "Vreest niet, noch treurt; maar verheugt u over het paradijs dat u wordt beloofd.
null.verse 41:31: "Wij zijn uw vrienden in dit leven en in het Hiernamaals.
null.verse 41:32: Als onthaal van de Vergevensgezinde, de Genadevolle.
null.verse 41:33: En wie spreekt beter woord dan hij die mensen tot God uitnodigt en goede werken doet en zegt: "Waarlijk, ik behoor tot de Moslims.
null.verse 41:34: Het goede en kwade zijn niet gelijk.
null.verse 41:35: Maar het is niemand gegeven behalve de geduldigen noch is het iemand gegeven behalve zij die een grote gave hebben.
null.verse 41:36: En als een ophitsing van Satan u treft, zoek dan toevlucht tot God.
null.verse 41:37: En onder Zijn tekenen zijn de dag en de nacht, de zon en de maan; derhalve werpt u niet neder voor de zon of de maan maar werpt u neder voor God Die hen schiep, indien gij Hem wilt aanbidden.
null.verse 41:38: Maar al tonen zij (de ongelovigen) hoogmoed, degenen die bij uw Heer zijn, verheerlijken Hem dag en nacht, en zij vervelen zich nooit.
null.verse 41:39: Dit behoort tot Zijn tekenen, dat gij de aarde droog en verschroeid ziet, maar wanneer Wij er water op nederzenden, beweegt zij zich en zet uit.
null.verse 41:40: Voorzeker, zij die Onze tekenen verdraaien zijn niet voor Ons verborgen.
null.verse 41:41: Voorzeker, zij die niet in de Vermaning geloven als deze tot hen komt (zijn de verliezers); waarlijk het is een machtig Boek.
null.verse 41:42: Geen valsheid kan het beroeren, van voren noch van achteren.
null.verse 41:43: Er is niets tot u gezegd behalve het geen aan de boodschappers vóór u was gezegd.
null.verse 41:44: Indien Wij deze Koran in een vreemde taal hadden gegeven, zouden zij zeker hebben gezegd: "Waarom zijn zijn verzen niet duidelijk gemaakt? Is Arabisch en niet-Arabisch gelijk?" Zeg: "Het is een leiding en een genezing voor de gelovigen.
null.verse 41:45: En Wij gaven Mozes het Boek, maar men verschilde er over van mening; en indien het woord van uw Heer er niet aan was voorafgegaan zou er zeker over hen geoordeeld zijn, want waarlijk zij verkeerden er in een verontrustende twijfel over.
null.verse 41:46: Wie goed doet, doet dit voor zijn eigen ziel; en wie kwaad bedrijft, het is er tegen.
null.verse 41:47: Naar Hem alleen wordt de kennis van het Uur verwezen.
null.verse 41:48: En de afgoden welke zij voorheen plachten aan te roepen, gaan voor hen verloren en zij zullen weten dat zij gee toevluchtsoord hebben.
null.verse 41:49: De mens wordt niet moe het goede te vragen; maar als het kwade hem treft vertwijfelt hij en wordt wanhopig.
null.verse 41:50: En als Wij hem barmhartigheid tonen nadat enige kommer over hem is gekomen, zal hij zeker zeggen: "Dit komt mij toe en ik denk niet dat het Uur zal plaatsvinden.
null.verse 41:51: Wanneer Wij gunsten aan de mens verlenen wendt hij zich af en gaat terzijde, maar wanneer het kwade hem raakt, ziet! dan offert hij lange, lange gebeden.
null.verse 41:52: Zeg: "Bedenkt u: Als dit (de Koran) van God is en gij verwerpt het - wie begaat grotere dwaling dan hij die zich hevig daartegen verzet?"
null.verse 41:53: Weldra zullen Wij hun Onze tekenen in henzelf en over afgelegen streken tonen, tot het hun duidelijk wordt dat dit de Waarheid is.
null.verse 41:54: Ziet toe! Zij zijn in twijfel over de ontmoeting met hun Heer.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:2: A revelation from the Beneficent, the Merciful,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:3: A Scripture whereof the verses are expounded, a Lecture in Arabic for people who have knowledge,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:5: And they say: Our hearts are protected from that unto which thou (O Muhammad) callest us, and in our ears there is a deafness, and between us and thee there is a veil.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:6: Say (unto them O Muhammad): I am only a mortal like you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:7: Who give not the poor-due, and who are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:8: Lo! as for those who believe and do good works, for them is a reward enduring.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:9: Say (O Muhammad, unto the idolaters): Disbelieve ye verily in Him Who created the earth in two Days, and ascribe ye unto Him rivals ? He (and none else) is the Lord of the Worlds.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:10: He placed therein firm hills rising above it, and blessed it and measured therein its sustenance in four Days, alike for (all) who ask;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:11: Then turned He to the heaven when it was smoke, and said unto it and unto the earth: Come both of you, willingly or loth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:12: Then He ordained them seven heavens in two Days and inspired in each heaven its mandate; and We decked the nether heaven with lamps, and rendered it inviolable.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:13: But if they turn away, then say: I warn you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt (which fell of old upon the tribes) of A’ad and Thamud;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:14: When their messengers came unto them from before them and behind them, saying: Worship none but Allah! they said: If our Lord had willed, He surely would have sent down angels (unto us), so lo! we are disbelievers in that wherewith ye have been sent.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:15: As for A’ad, they were arrogant in the land without right, and they said: Who is mightier than us in power ? Could they not see that Allah Who created them, He was mightier than them in power ? And they denied Our revelations.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:16: Therefor We let loose on them a raging wind in evil days, that We might make them taste the torment of disgrace in the life of the world.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:17: And as for Thamud, We gave them guidance, but they preferred blindness to the guidance, so the bolt of the doom of humiliation overtook them because of what they used to earn.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:18: And We delivered those who believed and used to keep their duty to Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:19: And (make mention of) the day when the enemies of Allah are gathered unto the Fire, they are driven on
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:20: Till, when they reach it, their ears and their eyes and their skins testify against them as to what they used to do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:21: And they say unto their skins: Why testify ye against us ? They say: Allah hath given us speech Who giveth speech to all things, and Who created you at the first, and unto Whom ye are returned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:22: Ye did not hide yourselves lest your ears and your eyes and your skins should testify against you, but ye deemed that Allah knew not much of what ye did.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:23: That, your thought which ye did think about your Lord, hath ruined you; and ye find yourselves (this day) among the lost.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:24: And though they are resigned, yet the Fire is still their home; and if they ask for favour, yet they are not of those unto whom favour can be shown.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:25: And We assigned them comrades (in the world), who made their present and their past fairseeming unto them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:26: Those who disbelieve say: Heed not this Qur’an, and drown the hearing of it; haply ye may conquer.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:27: But verily We shall cause those who disbelieve to taste an awful doom, and verily We shall requite them the worst of what they used to do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:28: That is the reward of Allah’s enemies: the Fire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:29: And those who disbelieve will say: Our Lord! Show us those who beguiled us of the jinn and humankind.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:30: Lo! those who say: Our Lord is Allah, and afterward are upright, the angels descend upon them, saying: Fear not nor grieve, but hear good tidings of the paradise which ye are promised.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:31: We are your protecting friends in the life of the world and in the Hereafter.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:32: A gift of welcome from One Forgiving, Merciful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:33: And who is better in speech than him who prayeth unto his Lord and doeth right, and saith: Lo! I am of those who are muslims (surrender unto Him).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:34: The good deed and the evil deed are not alike.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:35: But none is granted it save those who are steadfast, and none is granted it save the owner of great happiness.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:36: And if a whisper from the devil reach thee (O Muhammad) then seek refuge in Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:37: And of His portents are the night and the day and the sun and the moon.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:38: But if they are too proud - still those who are with thy Lord glorify Him night and day, and tire not.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:39: And of His portents (is this): that thou seest the earth lowly, but when We send down water thereon it thrilleth and groweth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:40: Lo! those who distort Our revelations are not hid from Us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:41: Lo! those who disbelieve in the Reminder when it cometh unto them (are guilty), for lo! it is an unassailable Scripture.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:42: Falsehood cannot come at it from before it or from behind it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:43: Naught is said unto thee (Muhammad) save what was said unto the messengers before thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:44: And if We had appointed it a Lecture in a foreign tongue they would assuredly have said: If only its verses were expounded (so that we might understand) ? What! A foreign tongue and an Arab ? - Say unto them (O Muhammad): For those who believe it is a guidance and a healing; and as for those who disbelieve, there is a deafness in their ears, and it is blindness for them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:45: And We verily gave Moses the Scripture, but there hath been dispute concerning it; and but for a Word that had already gone forth from thy Lord, it would ere now have been judged between them; but lo! they are in hopeless doubt concerning it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:46: Whoso doeth right it is for his soul, and whoso doeth wrong it is against it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:47: Unto Him is referred (all) knowledge of the Hour.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:48: And those to whom they used to cry of old have failed them, and they perceive they have no place of refuge.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:49: Man tireth not of praying for good, and if ill toucheth him, then he is disheartened, desperate.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:50: And verily, if We cause him to taste mercy after some hurt that hath touched him, he will say: This is my own; and I deem not that the Hour will ever rise, and if I am brought back to my Lord, I surely shall be better off with Him - But We verily shall tell those who disbelieve (all) that they did, and We verily shall make them taste hard punishment.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:51: When We show favour unto man, he withdraweth and turneth aside, but when ill toucheth him then he aboundeth in prayer.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:52: Bethink you: If it is from Allah and ye reject it - Who is further astray than one who is at open feud (with Allah) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:53: We shall show them Our portents on the horizons and within themselves until it will be manifest unto them that it is the Truth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 41:54: How! Are they still in doubt about the meeting with their Lord ? Lo! Is not He surrounding all things ? ?

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:2: A Revelation from (God), Most Gracious, Most Merciful;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:3: A Book, whereof the verses are explained in detail;- a Qur’an in Arabic, for people who understand;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:4: Giving good news and admonition: yet most of them turn away, and so they hear not.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:5: They say: "Our hearts are under veils, (concealed) from that to which thou dost invite us, and in our ears in a deafness, and between us and thee is a screen: so do thou (what thou wilt); for us, we shall do (what we will!)"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:6: Say thou: "I am but a man like you: It is revealed to me by Inspiration, that your God is one God: so stand true to Him, and ask for His Forgiveness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:7: Those who practise not regular Charity, and who even deny the Hereafter.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:8: For those who believe and work deeds of righteousness is a reward that will never fail.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:9: Say: Is it that ye deny Him Who created the earth in two Days? And do ye join equals with Him? He is the Lord of (all) the Worlds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:10: He set on the (earth), mountains standing firm, high above it, and bestowed blessings on the earth, and measure therein all things to give them nourishment in due proportion, in four Days, in accordance with (the needs of) those who seek (Sustenance).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:11: Moreover He comprehended in His design the sky, and it had been (as) smoke: He said to it and to the earth: "Come ye together, willingly or unwillingly.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:12: So He completed them as seven firmaments in two Days, and He assigned to each heaven its duty and command.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:13: But if they turn away, say thou: "I have warned you of a stunning Punishment (as of thunder and lightning) like that which (overtook) the ’Ad and the Thamud!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:14: Behold, the apostles came to them, from before them and behind them, (preaching): "Serve none but God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:15: Now the ’Ad behaved arrogantly through the land, against (all) truth and reason, and said: "Who is superior to us in strength?" What! did they not see that God, Who created them, was superior to them in strength? But they continued to reject Our Signs!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:16: So We sent against them a furious Wind through days of disaster, that We might give them a taste of a Penalty of humiliation in this life; but the Penalty of a Hereafter will be more humiliating still: and they will find no help.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:17: As to the Thamud, We gave them Guidance, but they preferred blindness (of heart) to Guidance: so the stunning Punishment of humiliation seized them, because of what they had earned.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:18: But We delivered those who believed and practised righteousness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:19: On the Day that the enemies of God will be gathered together to the Fire, they will be marched in ranks.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:20: At length, when they reach the (Fire), their hearing, their sight, and their skins will bear witness against them, as to (all) their deeds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:21: They will say to their skins: "Why bear ye witness against us?" They will say: "God hath given us speech,- (He) Who giveth speech to everything: He created you for the first time, and unto Him were ye to return.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:22: "Ye did not seek to hide yourselves, lest your hearing, your sight, and your skins should bear witness against you! But ye did think that God knew not many of the things that ye used to do!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:23: "But this thought of yours which ye did entertain concerning your Lord, hath brought you to destruction, and (now) have ye become of those utterly lost!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:24: If, then, they have patience, the Fire will be a home for them! and if they beg to be received into favour, into favour will they not (then) be received.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:25: And We have destined for them intimate companions (of like nature), who made alluring to them what was before them and behind them; and the sentence among the previous generations of Jinns and men, who have passed away, is proved against them; for they are utterly lost.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:26: The Unbelievers say: "Listen not to this Qur’an, but talk at random in the midst of its (reading), that ye may gain the upper hand!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:27: But We will certainly give the Unbelievers a taste of a severe Penalty, and We will requite them for the worst of their deeds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:28: Such is the requital of the enemies of God,- the Fire: therein will be for them the Eternal Home: a (fit) requital, for that they were wont to reject Our Sings.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:29: And the Unbelievers will say: "Our Lord! Show us those, among Jinns and men, who misled us: We shall crush them beneath our feet, so that they become the vilest (before all).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:30: In the case of those who say, "Our Lord is God", and, further, stand straight and steadfast, the angels descend on them (from time to time): "Fear ye not!" (they suggest), "Nor grieve! but receive the Glad Tidings of the Garden (of Bliss), the which ye were promised!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:31: "We are your protectors in this life and in the Hereafter: therein shall ye have all that your souls shall desire; therein shall ye have all that ye ask for!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:32: "A hospitable gift from one Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:33: Who is better in speech than one who calls (men) to God, works righteousness, and says, "I am of those who bow in Islam"?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:34: Nor can goodness and Evil be equal.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:35: And no one will be granted such goodness except those who exercise patience and self-restraint,- none but persons of the greatest good fortune.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:36: And if (at any time) an incitement to discord is made to thee by the Evil One, seek refuge in God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:37: Among His Sings are the Night and the Day, and the Sun and the Moon.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:38: But is the (Unbelievers) are arrogant, (no matter): for in the presence of thy Lord are those who celebrate His praises by night and by day.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:39: And among His Signs in this: thou seest the earth barren and desolate; but when We send down rain to it, it is stirred to life and yields increase.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:40: Those who pervert the Truth in Our Signs are not hidden from Us.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:41: Those who reject the Message when it comes to them (are not hidden from Us).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:42: No falsehood can approach it from before or behind it: It is sent down by One Full of Wisdom, Worthy of all Praise.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:43: Nothing is said to thee that was not said to the apostles before thee: that thy lord has at his Command (all) forgiveness as well as a most Grievous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:44: Had We sent this as a Qur’an (in the language) other than Arabic, they would have said: "Why are not its verses explained in detail? What! (a Book) not in Arabic and (a Messenger an Arab?" Say: "It is a Guide and a Healing to those who believe; and for those who believe not, there is a deafness in their ears, and it is blindness in their (eyes): They are (as it were) being called from a place far distant!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:45: We certainly gave Moses the Book aforetime: but disputes arose therein.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:46: Whoever works righteousness benefits his own soul; whoever works evil, it is against his own soul: nor is thy Lord ever unjust (in the least) to His Servants.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:47: To Him is referred the Knowledge of the Hour (of Judgment: He knows all): No date-fruit comes out of its sheath, nor does a female conceive (within her womb) nor bring forth the Day that (God) will propound to them the (question), "Where are the partners (ye attributed to Me?" They will say, "We do assure thee not one of us can bear witness!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:48: The (deities) they used to invoke aforetime will leave them in the lurch, and they will perceive that they have no way of escape.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:49: Man does not weary of asking for good (things), but if ill touches him, he gives up all hope (and) is lost in despair.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:50: When we give him a taste of some Mercy from Ourselves, after some adversity has touched him, he is sure to say, "This is due to my (merit): I think not that the Hour (of Judgment) will (ever) be established; but if I am brought back to my Lord, I have (much) good (stored) in His sight!" But We will show the Unbelievers the truth of all that they did, and We shall give them the taste of a severe Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:51: When We bestow favours on man, he turns away, and gets himself remote on his side (instead of coming to Us); and when evil seizes him, (he comes) full of prolonged prayer!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:52: Say: "See ye if the (Revelation) is (really) from God, and yet do ye reject it? Who is more astray than one who is in a schism far (from any purpose)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:53: Soon will We show them our Signs in the (furthest) regions (of the earth), and in their own souls, until it becomes manifest to them that this is the Truth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 41:54: Ah indeed! Are they in doubt concerning the Meeting with their Lord? Ah indeed! It is He that doth encompass all things!

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:2: A sending down from the Merciful, the Compassionate.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:3: A Book whose signs have been distinguished as an Arabic Koran for a people having knowledge,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:4: good tidings to bear, and warning, but most of them have turned away, and do not give ear.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:5: They say, ’Our hearts are veiled from what thou callest us to, and in our ears is a heaviness, and between us and thee there is a veil; so act; we are acting!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:6: Say: ’I am only a mortal, like you are.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:7: who pay not the alms, and disbelieve in the world to come.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:8: Surely those who believe, and do righteous deeds shall have a wage unfailing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:9: Say: ’What, do you disbelieve in Him who created the earth in two days, and do you set up compeers to Him? That is the Lord of all Being.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:10: ’And He set therein firm mountains over it, and He blessed it, and He ordained therein its diverse sustenance in four days, equal to those who ask.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:11: Then He lifted Himself to heaven when it was smoke, and said to it and to the earth, "Come willingly, or unwillingly!" They said, "We come willingly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:12: So He determined them as seven heavens in two days, and revealed its commandment in every heaven.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:13: And We adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and to reserve; that is the ordaining of the All-mighty, the All-knowing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:14: When the Messengers came unto them from before them and from behind them, saying, ’Serve none but God,’ they said, ’Had our Lord willed, surely He would have sent down angels; so we disbelieve in the Message you were sent with.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:15: As for Ad, they waxed proud in the earth without right, and they said, ’Who is stronger than we in might?’ What, did they not see that God, who created them, was stronger than they in might? And they denied Our signs.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:16: Then We loosed against them a wind clamorous in days of ill fortune, that We might let them taste the chastisement of degradation in the present life; and the chastisement of the world to come is even more degrading, and they shall not be helped.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:17: As for Thamood, We guided them, but they preferred blindness above guidance, so the thunderbolt of the chastisement of humiliation seized them for that they were earning.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:18: And We delivered those who believed and were godfearing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:19: Upon the day when God’s enemies are mustered to the Fire, duly disposed,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:20: till when they are come to it, their hearing, their eyes and their skins bear witness against them concerning what they have been doing,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:21: and they will say to their skins, ’Why bore you witness against us?’ They shall say, ’God gave us speech, as He gave everything speech.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:22: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:23: That then, the thought you thought about your Lord, has destroyed you, and therefore you find yourselves this morning among the losers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:24: Then if they persist, the Fire shall be a lodging for them; and if they ask amends yet no amends shall be made to them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:25: We have allotted them comrades, and they have decked out fair to them that which is before them and behind them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:26: The unbelievers say, ’Do not give ear to this Koran, and talk idly about it; haply you will overcome.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:27: So We shall let the unbelievers taste a terrible chastisement, and shall recompense them with the worst of what they were working.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:28: That is the recompense of God’s enemies -- the Fire, wherein they shall have the Abode of Eternity as a recompense, for that they denied Our signs.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:29: And the unbelievers shall say, ’Our Lord, show us those that led us astray, both jinn and men, and we shall set them underneath our feet, that they may be among the lower ones.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:30: Those who have said, ’Our Lord is God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:31: We are your friends in the present life and in the world to come; therein you shall have all that your souls desire, all that you call for,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:32: as hospitality from One All-forgiving, One All-compassionate.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:33: And who speaks fairer than he who calls unto God and does righteousness and says, ’Surely I am of them that surrender’?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:34: Not equal are the good deed and the evil deed.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:35: Yet none shall receive it, except the steadfast; none shall receive it, except a man of mighty fortune.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:36: If a provocation from Satan should provoke thee, seek refuge in God; He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:37: And of His signs are the night and the day, the sun and the moon.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:38: And if they wax proud, yet those who are with thy Lord do glorify Him by night and day, and grow not weary.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:39: And of His signs is that thou seest the earth humble; then, when We send down water upon it, it quivers, and swells.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 41:40: Those who blaspheme Our signs are not hidden from Us.
